transArray.content:
Very good, qie
Facilities: Very clean and hygienic, with good environment, convenient transportation, good front desk service attitude, and convenient travel. I will choose here again next time I travel to Beijing for business. It is very good.
The heartfelt words are silent but sweet, the greetings are ordinary but warm, your trust is the most real, the friendship is elegant but the most precious. I wish you happiness and joy!
